name: C/C++ Analyser
description: Python script analysing C/C++ source code files using Clang, extracting information about functions including their names, parameter types, return types, functions called within them, and differences between function bodies.

name: JWTHawk
description: This script decodes JWT tokens using multiple secrets from a list. It prints header values, attempts decoding with each secret, and prints payload values with the decoded signature if a match is found.

name: Cookie Monster
description: This script uses Selenium to automate web interactions, including login and cookie manipulation. It prints a title, prompts for login credentials, logs in, alters cookies, and confirms success by reloading the page.
